channel.title: UMAP2018 - 26th Conference on User Modeling, Adaptation and Personalization
channel.description: UMAP – User Modelling, Adaptation and Personalization – is the premier international conference for researchers and practitioners working on systems that adapt to individual users, to groups of users, and that collect, represent, and model user information.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
We’re very excited that UMAP2018 website gets online!

More details will come soon.
